title: how am I not getting an S- or higher??
body: Ive been playing adc and shredding enemy team last two games getting 6-1-4 and 200 farm as enemy team surrenders and then 10-3-5 with 200 farm as well winning at 28 min i can understand if farm was the problem in last game but come on...

replies.body: Those mastery scores involve a bit more than just KDA/CS/game time. It calculates how well you did *compared to others using that champion in that role* so you may just not be doing as well other some others. It's also worth mentioning that vision score plays a role as well.
